column4: i'm planning get GeForce 7600GT 256MB but its not listed on HardwareSupportComponentsVideoCardsNvidia
I'm pretty sure you should be okay... let me check something and get back to you.
The linux nvidia driver from nvidia's site supports the 7600gt.  So you should be good.  Good AGP card too, I have it on my window's computer.
also does ASUS P5W DH Deluxe motherboard works too?
